sentences.en: Do not attempt to remove the grille the speaker system.
sentences.cn: 请勿试图卸下扬声器格栅.

sentences.en: Ensure that the grille is in place while the machinery is in operation.
sentences.cn: 机器运转时一定要放好安全网罩.

sentences.en: Fitted under the grille and powered by compressed air.
sentences.cn: 安装在格窗下方,采用压缩空气动力.

sentences.en: Grille diffuser on a duct end. Diffuser properties can be specified.
sentences.cn: 管道末端的格栅扩散器. 可指定扩散器属性.

sentences.en: Grille passed radiator to redesign, taller than before steeper.
sentences.cn: 散热器格栅经过了重新设计, 比原来更高更陡.

sentences.en: In general, the deformation of the model grille is a combination of axial and shear strains.
sentences.cn: 一般情况下, 模型栅格的变形是轴向应变和切向应变的组合.

sentences.en: Let me have a look at the radiator grille.
sentences.cn: 我来检查一下散热器护栅.

sentences.en: Position grille at grille opening panel.
sentences.cn: 将风栅放置在风栅开启板处.

sentences.en: Remove screws attaching the adjuster to the grille opening reinforcement ( GOR ).
sentences.cn: 拆卸用以固定调整器至 格栅 口加固板的螺丝.

sentences.en: The bank clerk peered at the customer through / from behind the grille.
sentences.cn: 银行的职员从格栅后面看着顾客.

sentences.en: The grille area also closed off for Series I cars.
sentences.cn: 在格栅也被关闭过我的系列轿车.

sentences.en: This Grille apply wall deer vehicles, quality and cheap. welcome to order.
sentences.cn: 此中网适用于长城迪尔车, 质优价廉, 欢迎订购.

sentences.en: This is complemented with a new plastic radiator grille.
sentences.cn: 这与全新的塑料散热格栅形成互补.

sentences.en: Whoever it was lit a cigarette and dropped it through the grille.
sentences.cn: 不管是谁点着了烟然后从窗格子扔进去.

sentences.en: Winston and Syme pushed their trays beneath the grille.
sentences.cn: 温斯顿跟赛姆便把托盘推到铁栅下.

words.tran_cn: 炙烤（grill的过去式和过去分词）
格子；格子窗；（银行，邮局柜台上的）[建]铁栅

trans.tran_cn: 格子，格栅，（汽车散热器的）护栅
